verses.name: Job 35:12
verses.text: There they cry, but none giveth answer, because of the pride of evil men.

verses.name: Job 35:13
verses.text: Surely God will not hear vanity, neither will the Almighty regard it.

verses.name: Job 35:14
verses.text: Although thou sayest thou shalt not see him, yet judgment is before him; therefore trust thou in him.

verses.name: Job 35:15
verses.text: But now, because it is not so, he hath visited in his anger; yet he knoweth it not in great extremity:

verses.name: Job 35:16
verses.text: Therefore doth Job open his mouth in vain; he multiplieth words without knowledge.
